titleStmt.title: A scourge for the directorie, and the revolting synod. Which hath sitten this 5. yeares, more for foure shillings a day, then for conscience sake. / By Judge Jenkins.
titleStmt.author: Jenkins, David, 1582-1663.

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copies: "8ber [i.e. October] 2d" (409[24]); "June 14th 1648", the "7" in the imprint has been crossed out (447[14]).
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.
